metadata.title: CVE-2023-30608 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: sqlparse is a non-validating SQL parser module for Python. In affectedversions the SQL parser contains a regular expression that is vulnerable toReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service). This issue was introduced bycommit `e75e358`. The vulnerability may lead to Denial of Service (DoS).This issues has been fixed in sqlparse 0.4.4 by commit `c457abd5f`. Usersare advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

criterions.comment: sqlparse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
